itunes:title: Episode 746 - Was Trump's Speech Too Late?
title: Episode 746 - Was Trump's Speech Too Late?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Donald Trump's complete 180 speech against the violence at the Capitol, Ben & Jerry's ridiculous statement on why all white people are bad, Lebron James defending Jacob Blake, the Washington Post's decision to publ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Donald Trump's complete 180 speech against the violence at the Capitol, Ben & Jerry's ridiculous statement on why all white people are bad, Lebron James defending Jacob Blake, the Washington Post's decision to publish the video of the woman being shot at the Capitol, and Sydney Powell being sued for $1.3 billion by Dominion voting software.
